duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and communicate the strategic vision and goals for the digital health product, aligning them with broader organizational objectives.
Lead and support a high-powered team of product managers, fostering a collaborative and high-performing culture.
Collaborate closely with product, development, design, and QA teams to ensure efficient development cycles, timely delivery of features, and adherence to quality standards.
Develop and maintain a strategic product roadmap that reflects market trends, Voice of the Customer, and business priorities.
Collaborate with technology, business, and clinical stakeholders to understand their requirements and incorporate their input into the product strategy.
Ensure product execution excellence and optimize the product development lifecycle for quality work and meeting deadlines.
Build strong relationships and effectively communicate the product vision and progress.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business, or related industry required. Relevant Master's degree preferred.
